tweets.text:
#Solidarity within EU countries can only be strengthened if solidarity btw countries is boosted .#socialmodel
http://t.co/Qft2xyRIY4
Promoting change in education policy and practice - the value of peer learning conference #CEDEFOP #Thessaloniki http://t.co/zs8wxjOm1K
@LaszloAndorEU: We have to step up efforts to involve social partners in EU policy & decision maling. @VBOFEB @_BUSINESSEUROPE #socialmodel
"Better online sharing of vacancies and increased mobility are key for employment," says EU Commissioner @LaszloAndorEU #socialmodel
P Beres, MEP, argues that companies do require regulation and cannot be left entirely to their own devices. #socialmodel
EU Commissioner for Employment @LaszloAndorEU next at 4 EU Agencies seminar on #socialmodel: Follow his speech live: http://t.co/WnA6swmRgj
#Vocationaltraining has an image problem! #etf #socialmodel @Cedefop
Deputy Prime Minister Lazar, Moldova, says the EU social model is part of the success and appeal of the EU. #socialmodel
Alejando Cercas (MEP) "Has Europe a future without its Social Model?" Eurropean #socialmodel conference
Consensus on need for social protection  but issue who should provide says Baudoin Regout #competitiveness @eurofound @etf @EU_OSHA @cedefop
#dialoguesocial européen + inclusif des artisans et #pme! Cela fait partie du #socialmodel ! Nous le demandons depuis 6 ans! @PervencheBeres
Baudoin Regout, BEPA, sees the link between health and safety and good business practice. #socialmodel
Alejandro CERCAS, MEP, regrets the weakening of the welfare state. Does Europe have a future without a Social Model? #socialmodel
At EP #socialmodel event: CEEMET: "We do not use full potential of agency work."
Fantastic speeches from the four agencies @Cedefop , @EU_OSHA , @eurofound and @etfeuropa at the European Parliament.
Discussion kicks off in the EP, with Valeriu Lazar, Deputy Prime Minister Moldova taking the floor #socialmodel
Director of @etfeuropa speaks about developing neighbouring countries’ human capital as win-win situation for EU http://t.co/4fjzqDv1Tf
#socialmodel @EU_OSHA Director says we need to increase the proportion of working women.  There is some caching-up to do.
@PervencheBeres, MEP and Chair of EP Employment Committee is now chairing  #socialmodel semniar: Follow live: http://t.co/WnA6swmRgj
PrES industry plays its part "@Cedefop Acting Dir.: We need to increase number of enterprises providing work-based learning #socialmodel"
Action! "@eurofound: Policies not treaties make a difference  #socialmodel #competitiveness http://t.co/Y0cQ3Zriub @etf @EU_OSHA @cedefop"
At seminar EuropeanSocialModel A Key Driver for Competitiveness with @eurofound @cedefop @etfeuropa @eu_osha http://t.co/VzfX9mk2lA
Eurociett is here! "@Cedefop: Acting Dir. Lettmayr at 4 EU agencies seminar on EU #socialmodel: VET essential for Europe's #competitiveness"
Very good point from @Cedefop that the skill set of a well trained & educated person can become obsolete when unemployed. @EU_OSHA
Today´s #socialmodel seminar demonstrates "Working together. Learning for life." @EPSocialAffairs, @etfeuropa,@cedefop,@eu_osha  @eurofound
What defines the European #socialmodel? Soon presentations from directors of 4 EU Agencies  @etfeuropa, @cedefop, @eu_osha and @eurofound
"Cost of non investment in social policies in non affordable for #eu" #eac #pratsMonné @Cedefop @EU_Social @Europarl_EN
#Socialmodel "The cost of not investing in education is unaffordable", says Xavier Prats Monne, DG Education and Culture.
Policies not treaties will make a difference  #socialmodel #competitiveness http://t.co/VZvfsRflrh @etf @euosha @cedefop
